abstract.p: Westchester County lawmaker Richard G Wishnie is working with county budget director Kathleen M Tooher to prepare budget-training workshops as part of legislative emphasis on open government (S)

block.p: If County Legislator Richard G. Wishnie has his way, his fellow lawmakers will be joining him and thousands of other Westchester residents in a September ritual -- going back to class.

Mr. Wishnie, chairman of the Budget and Appropriations Committee of the Board of Legislators, has been working with the county's Budget Director, Kathleen M. Tooher, to prepare budget-training workshops.
If County Legislator Richard G. Wishnie has his way, his fellow lawmakers will be joining him and thousands of other Westchester residents in a September ritual -- going back to class.

Mr. Wishnie, chairman of the Budget and Appropriations Committee of the Board of Legislators, has been working with the county's Budget Director, Kathleen M. Tooher, to prepare budget-training workshops.

''As part of our legislative emphasis on open government, I hope we can establish some sessions to help residents interpret the budget and gain greater insight into county government,'' Mr. Wishnie said. ''The time is right because the county will be adopting a number of changes in the budget to make it more user-friendly.''
Mr. Wishnie said the budget sessions might be shown on cable television or placed on the Internet.
The budget lessons for legislators are to begin after Labor Day.
